CLASHING.Definition: meeting each other with a loud noise

BOLDNESS.Definition: confidence and will to take risks

BLOOD THIRSTY.Definition: enjoying to watch violence and blood

MARTYR.Definition: a person who suffered because of his beliefs

TREND.Definition: general way in which they were behaving

CELLS.Definition: small rooms in which they were kept

ASHES.Definition: what was left after it had been burnt

HEAL.Definition: become well again after having been injured

KIDNEYS.Definition: small organs in the body that remove wastes and extra water to make urine

ARTERIES.Definition: thick tubes in the body that carry blood from the heart to other parts of the body

SURGEON.Definition: doctor who treated injuries or diseases by operations in which the body sometimes had to be cut open

PUSH UPS.Definition: an exercise in which they lay facing the floor and, keeping their back straight, raised their body by pressing down on their hands

SIT UPS.Definition: a physical exercise in which they stood up from a horizontal position without using the arms for leverage.

AGILE.Definition: able to be done quickly and easily

DAGGER.Definition: a short pointed knife used as a weapon

SPEAR.Definition: a weapon consisting of a long wooden part with a sharp metal point on the end

SELLING POINT.Definition: characteristic that made them special and attractive

TRIDENT.Definition: a weapon consisting of a long wooden part with 3 sharp metal points on the end

EXOTIC.Definition: unusual and exciting because of coming from a far away place

DUEL.Definition: an arranged fight between two people

REFRESHMENTS.Definition: small amounts of food and drink

WHIPPED.Definition: beaten with strips of leather tied to a handle

SUSPENSE.Definition: feeling of excitement and nervousness about what was coming next

CASH REWARD.Definition: reward in the form of money

WAIT WITH BATED BREATH.Definition: wait anxiously to find out what will happen

HAND GESTURES.Definition: movements of the hand or arms

CLOSED FIST.Definition: a hand with the fingers closed in the palm

THIGH.Definition: the part of the leg above the knee

CLUB.Definition: a heavy stick with a thick end, used as a weapon

STRANGLED.Definition: killed by having his throat pressed so that he couldn't breathe

BLOODTHIRSTY.Definition: enjoying to watch violence and blood

TRANSITION.Definition: change from the previous form to a new one
